COMMON.BLOCK_TITLE: Block this item for example if it has a dependency that can not be satisfied

COMMON.TEAM_REQUIREMENT: Team requirement is a requirement that must exist in the project but should have no cost for the client
COMMON.CAPSLOCK_WARNING: Be careful! You are using capital letters in an input field that is case sensitive.

META.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Taiga is a project management platform for startups and agile developers & designers who want a simple, beautiful tool that makes work truly enjoyable.

LOGIN.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Logging in to Taiga, a project management platform for startups and agile developers & designers who want a simple, beautiful tool that makes work truly enjoyable.

LOGIN_FORM.ERROR_AUTH_INCORRECT: Oompa Loompas sanovat että käyttäjänimesi tai sähköpostisi tai salasanasi on väärä.
LOGIN_FORM.SUCCESS: Oompa Loompas ovat onnellisia, tervetuloa Taigaan.

REGISTER.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Create your account in Taiga, a project management platform for startups and agile developers & designers who want a simple, beautiful tool that makes work truly enjoyable.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Enter your username or email to get a new password and you can access to Taiga again.

CHANGE_PASSWORD.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Set a new password for your Taiga account and hey!, you may want to eat some more iron-rich food, it's good for your brain :P

CHANGE_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_FORM.TITLE: Luo uusi pääsy Taigaan
CHANGE_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_FORM.SUBTITLE: Rautapitoinen ruoka on hyväksi aivoille :P

Yritä kirjautua sisään sillä.

INVITATION.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Accept the invitation to join a project in Taiga, a project management platform for startups and agile developers & designers who want a simple, beautiful tool that makes work truly enjoyable.

HOME.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: The Taiga home page with your main projects and all your assigned and watched user stories, tasks and issues
HOME.EMPTY_WORKING_ON: It feels empty, doesn't it? Start working with Taiga and you'll see here the stories, tasks and issues you are working on.
HOME.EMPTY_WATCHING: Follow User Stories, Tasks, Issues in your projects and be notified about its changes :)

EMPTY.TITLE: It looks like there aren't any epics yet

Epics are items at a higher level that encompass user stories.
Epics are at the top of the hierarchy and can be used to group user stories together.

US.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Status: {{userStoryStatus }}. Completed {{userStoryProgressPercentage}}% ({{userStoryClosedTasks}} of {{userStoryTotalTasks}} tasks closed). Points: {{userStoryPoints}}. Description: {{userStoryDescription}}

TRIBE.PUBLISH: Publish as Gig in Taiga Tribe
TRIBE.PUBLISH_TITLE: More info on publishing in Taiga Tribe
TRIBE.PUBLISHED_AS_GIG: Story published as Gig in Taiga Tribe
TRIBE.PUBLISH_MORE_INFO_TITLE: Do you need somebody for this task?
TRIBE.PUBLISH_MORE_INFO_TEXT:
If you need help with a particular piece of work you can easily create gigs on Taiga Tribe and receive help from all over the world. You will be able to control and manage the gig enjoying a great community eager to contribute.

TaigaTribe was born as a Taiga sibling. Both platforms can live separately but we believe that there is much power in using them combined so we are making sure the integration works like a charm.

HINTS.HINT1_TITLE: Did you know you can import and export projects?
HINTS.HINT1_TEXT: This allow you to extract all your data from one Taiga and move it to another one.
HINTS.HINT2_TITLE: Did you know you can create custom fields?
HINTS.HINT2_TEXT: Teams can now create custom fields as a flexible means to enter specific data useful for their particular workflow.

HINTS.HINT3_TEXT: The 10 projects are listed in the direct access bar at the top.
HINTS.HINT4_TITLE: Did you forget what were you working on?
HINTS.HINT4_TEXT: Don't worry, on your dashboard you'll find your open tasks, issues, and user stories in the order you worked on them.

LEGAL.TERMS_OF_SERVICE_AND_PRIVACY_POLICY_AD:
When creating a new account, you agree to our
terms of service and privacy policy.

EXTERNAL_APP.AUTHORIZATION_REQUEST: Authorize {{application}} to use your Taiga account?

STEP1.TITLE: Projektisi
STEP1.TEXT: Welcome! Here you will find the projects you are involved on.

STEP2.TITLE: Working on
STEP2.TEXT: Here you will find the User Stories, Tasks and Issues in which you are working on.

STEP3.TITLE: Seuraa
STEP3.TEXT1: And right here you will find the ones in your projects that you want to know about.
STEP3.TEXT2: You are already working with Taiga ;)

STEP4.TITLE: Let’s start
STEP4.TEXT1: You can start by creating your first Taiga project.

STEP1.TITLE: Project summary
STEP1.TEXT1: Here you will see the state of your project.
STEP1.TEXT2: You can change every kind of project settings through the admin.

STEP2.TITLE: Product backlog
STEP2.TEXT: The backlog is the list of requirements (User Stories) for the project. Here is where you will plan your sprints.

STEP3.TITLE: Kierrokset
STEP3.TEXT: Sprints are short periods of time (usually 2 weeks) during which specific work has to be completed and delivered.

STEP4.TITLE: Käyttäjätarinat
STEP4.TEXT: Those are the requirements at high level. You can add them to the backlog and drag them to the sprint in which it should be delivered.

STEP1.TITLE: Customize your workflow
STEP1.TEXT: Set up the columns you need to map your workflow statuses through the admin.

STEP2.TITLE: User Stories & Tasks
STEP2.TEXT: User Stories are the requirements at high level. You can drag them to different columns.

STEP3.TITLE: Adding User Stories
STEP3.TEXT1: You may want to add a single User Story (add US icon) or a group of them (bulk icon)

DISCOVER.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Searchable directory of Public Projects in Taiga. Explore backlogs, timelines, issues, and teams. Check out the most liked or most active projects. Filter by Kanban or Scrum.
DISCOVER.DISCOVER_SUBTITLE: {projects, plural, one{One public project to discover} other{# public projects to discover}}
DISCOVER.MOST_ACTIVE_EMPTY: There are no ACTIVE projects yet
DISCOVER.MOST_LIKED_EMPTY: There are no LIKED projects yet
DISCOVER.RECRUITING: This project is looking for people
DISCOVER.EMPTY:
There are no projects to show with this search criteria.
Try again!

SEARCH.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Searchable directory of Public Projects in Taiga. Explore backlogs, timelines, issues, and teams. Check out the most liked or most active projects. Filter by Kanban or Scrum.
